title: Creating Rhino/GH Plugins in Script Editor
question:
I finally got the initial round of documentation done for the Script Editor 
“Projects”
 that had previously made a video about here:












Checkout these docs pages and let me know if you see any bugs or want more features. Test the most recent 
Rhino 8.11 SRC
 please:




Creating Rhino Projects
: Learn how to make code projects in Script Editor and add new Rhino commands and Grasshopper components


Creating Rhino and Grasshopper Plugins
: Learn how to generate Rhino and Grasshopper plugins from Script Editor


RhinoCode Command Line Interface
: Learn how to build your projects from command line




I am continuing finishing up 
the rest of the doc pages
 for the new Script Editor
